This module implements binary fields.

Low-level Implementation Documentations:

  • xmm
  • bit64
  • bit32

Types

BinField = XmmBinField
Binary field.

Procs

func canPop(self: BinField): bool {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns true if any cell can pop. Note that this function is only slightly lighter than extractedPop. 
func conn2(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly two cells are connected. 
func conn2Horizontal(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly two cells are connected horizontally. 
func conn2Vertical(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly two cells are connected vertically. 
func conn3(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly three cells are connected. 
func conn3Horizontal(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly three cells are connected horizontally. 
func conn3LShape(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly three cells are connected by L-shape. 
func conn3Vertical(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field where exactly three cells are connected vertically. 
func extractedPop(self: BinField): BinField {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [],
    forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field with cells that will pop. 
func invalidPlacements(self: BinField): set[Placement] {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the invalid placements. 
func isDead(self: BinField; rule: static Rule): bool {.inline, ...raises: [].}
Returns true if the binary field is in a defeated state. 
func toArr(self: BinField): array[Row, array[Col, bool]] {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the array converted from the binary field. 
func toBinField(arr: array[Row, array[Col, bool]]): BinField {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the binary field converted from the array. 
func validDblPlacements(self: BinField): set[Placement] {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [], forbids: [].}
Returns the valid placements for double pairs.
